sources.title: A Lust To Kill (1958)
sources.description: A Western. [The "MPEG4" file is the source file. Download it if your player can handle h.265 (HEVC).]

sources.title: A Lust to Kill (1958) JIM DAVIS â™  ALLISON HAYES
sources.description:
It's FRIDAY@PizzaFLIX
Stars: Jim Davis, Don Megowan, Allison Hayes
Director: Oliver Drake

In this Pulpy Western,  Jim Davis stars a cunning lawman on the trail of a vengeance-driven gunslinger. Stealing every scene as the outlaw's moll is Allison Hayes, the Giant of SCREAM QUEENS who made cinematic history in Attack of the 50-Foot Woman.

metadata.Plot: A cowboy escapes from jail with the help of his girlfriend, and goes after the men he believes are responsible for his brother being shot down by lawmen.
metadata.Actors: Jim Davis, Don Megowan, Allison Hayes
